title: Chilliwack Canyon - Camp Foley to Slesse
whats_it_like: Pool-drop at low and medium, continuous at higher levels, bedrock and boulder gardens, medium volume river

difficulty.text: III-IV low, IV- medium, IV high

scouting_portaging: Everything is easy to scout and portage. Check 'Mel's' for wood.
when_to_go: Year round, may be too low in winter and late summer if it does not rain.
